website_summaries.verdict: This waterproof Bluetooth speaker delivers exceptional clarity, deep bass, and amazing sound.
pros: Supports a wide range of Bluetooth-enabled devices
Speaker is shockproof, dustproof, and waterproof up to IPX6 levels
Features an installed rechargeable lithium-ion battery that provides up to 10 hours of playing time on a single charge
Requires only a few hours to recharge the speaker
cons: Doesn't hold a charge as well as comparable Bluetooth speakers

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for pool!
customer_reviews.text: So far I don’t think I’ve had any issues. I don’t even think it’s gone dead yet. I just make sure I put on charger 1-2 hours before I go to pool. Music comes out both sides. Not too large or small. Hard to open charging port, but gets easier each time. Love the shade of blue.
customer_reviews.author: Brandie Y

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for work (in a kitchen in a hospital) in lieu of a radio (which get bad reception where I work). The sound is pretty good for a little Bluetooth speaker, and it's pretty loud! There's some distortion at the top volume, but so far it's pretty good for what I'm using it for. I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: sabre03

customer_reviews.title: Great for Water Aerobics
customer_reviews.text: So cute! Such a big sound! I use the bluetooth with my iPod for water aerobics with no fear of splashing killing the speaker. It’s plenty loud over the fans in the indoor pool, and all the noises of the outdoor pool. Update: After two years of daily use, this speaker is still amazing. Such a big sound, and all the splashing of our 5x a week water aerobics hasn’t hurt it at all. It still holds a charge for many hours.
customer_reviews.author: KING

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price and size
customer_reviews.text: We bought a pontoon that is seriously lacking in the sound system department, so bought this to use until we can (hopefully) replace the sound system. Works and sounds great, and love that it can Bluetooth to our phones! (We haven't tested the water resistance part yet, and hope not to have to! Lol!)
customer_reviews.author: Dance Mom

customer_reviews.title: and doesn't distort when the volume is loud like my jawbone jambox (original
customer_reviews.text: For the price this little guy is phenomenal! I used it for a few hours yesterday, used it with my sound machine app ALL NIGHT and for an hour again today. Still has juice! It's loud, clear, and doesn't distort when the volume is loud like my jawbone jambox (original, RIP) and knowing it's at least water resistant and has that cool little built in charger makes this inexpensive speaker a very good buy. I received this product at a discount for my honest opinion. It really is a great speaker, and built well!
customer_reviews.author: The Auditor

customer_reviews.title: A wonderful little speaker!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this speaker! I have had it for two years now. The sound quality is very good and the battery charge lasts weeks (with a few hours or daily use)... even after two years! I use it in the shower, by the pool and when gardening. It’s so nice not it have to worry about getting it wet from the sprinkler or falling into the pool.
customer_reviews.author: MissSweet

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't charge
customer_reviews.text: Maybe mine was defective but it wouldn't charge so it's useless to me now. And I didn't use it much the first month so by the time I realized it wouldn't charge the return window was closed. I really wish I could get my money back because I'm never going to get any use out of this. I ended up just getting a jbl instead which works great.
customer_reviews.author: Tess A.

customer_reviews.title: You won’t regret getting this one!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m so impressed with this speaker. First, it arrived earlier than anticipated. Then it charged up super fast. Connected with ease. And the sound is awesome! Which that alone is amazing because our backyard backs up to the freeway!!! So under priced!!!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Presley

customer_reviews.title: Super long battery life
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. It can go loud enough to annoy my roommates and the battery life lasts a really long time. Only criticism would be that you can't tell when it's getting low on battery, but I haven't had many problems. Pairs to multiple devices well. Perfect for a shower.
customer_reviews.author: Grayson Dailey

customer_reviews.title: Speaker is great
customer_reviews.text: I use this thing in the shower all the time. Very reliable. Sealed tight. Water has never gotten through. Blutooth connection is solid. Sound quality is great. The water proof phone cover this came with broke instantly lol. But I didn't buy this for that and didn't even know it came with that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for water
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for canoeing! It has a tie you can hook to canoe. The volume is good and very water proof. I’ve taking mine on several trips. I even ordered additional ones for family.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Barbre

customer_reviews.title: Not so waterproof or
customer_reviews.text: This speaker sucks...it doesn’t work at all. Honestly we haven’t tried to contact the seller, but it never stayed charged, it worked one time and then stopped abruptly, never to come back on again. It says it is charged but never makes a sound.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Windsor

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I've gone through a variety of Bluetooth speakers in recent years, and this is my favorite so far. The size is perfect. The sound is very good, and I can confirm that it is, in fact, water-resistant (not waterproof). I have no complaint and recommend it without reservation. MOST SALIENT FEATURE: Battery life is great--better than billed. They say ten hours. I get more like 15-20!
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Great survivor waterproof product!
customer_reviews.text: Sold product, floats definitely waterproof and has lasted over a year now with no issue. Only thing is i wish you could charge your supported usb device while playing music. But overall it’s great!
customer_reviews.author: camille ramos

customer_reviews.title: The sound of the system isn't the best, but for a small speaker it's OK
customer_reviews.text: I got this yesterday and returning it today. The sound of the system isn't the best, but for a small speaker it's OK. However, when I had it in water, the sound was HORRIBLE!! Also, the speaker would roll over in the water and you couldn't hear any sound. One other item I have to mention is their description of it being "sleek" ... there's nothing "sleek" about this unit.
customer_reviews.author: D. Pugh

customer_reviews.title: After a year of use...
customer_reviews.text: I've had this over a year and use it daily to stream from my phone will I'm in the shower or in the kitchen. Good sound, loud enough bug my neighbors, and I only have charge it every 10 - 14 days. Good cough for me to look back a year and find the purchase to write this. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: CJ Van

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy an preforms excellent.
customer_reviews.text: The Product is as described and has been great, I use it while in our pool and in the workshop.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Survived the Colorado River
customer_reviews.text: I bought this specifically for a river trip in Yuma with family and friends. We have a group of 20. I had my cellphone safely put away in a dry sack and had this speaker. We used it all day long and it got drenched at times. Water, sand and everything else. The ability to have music for our lazy day float made the day that much enjoyable.
customer_reviews.author: Ruthann H

customer_reviews.title: when its sitting on the side of the pool it's great. Suits us just fine
customer_reviews.text: Not as loud when its floating in the water. However, when its sitting on the side of the pool it's great. Suits us just fine
customer_reviews.author: Agenta Russo

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't Charge
customer_reviews.text: The speaker wouldn't charge at all - When I plugged it in the red light would come on for a minute or less and then cut off, meaning that it wasn't charging anymore. Thankfully I was able to return the speaker and receive my full refund.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: CAN'T KEEP THEM ON OUR SHELF
customer_reviews.text: BETWEEN THE PRICE AND THE QUALITY OF THE PRODUCT WE CANT KEEP THEM IN STOCK. WE SELL THEM AS QUICKLY AS WE GET THEM IN. WE HAVE A LARGE WATER RECREATION AREA HERE BETWEEN CANYON lAKE AND THE GUADALUPE RIVER AND TONS OF OUT OF TOWNERS WHO COME IN....AMAZED AT THE QUALITY AND PRICE WHEN THEY PURCHASE.
customer_reviews.author: REBECCA - PURCHASING SPECIALIST

customer_reviews.title: it works but sound quality not great.
customer_reviews.text: It works but sound quality not great. not stereo sound and not very loud.
customer_reviews.author: just an average guy

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: So little money for such a big sound. Use it while working outside a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Best speaker out there for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This speaker has become part of my everyday life now! I bought it just for the summer to take to the beach. It works amazing and the sound is perfect. It's loud and can get really loud. Doesn't distort my music and actually has quite a bit of bass to be so small. I now use it all around my house. Would recommend this product all day everyday!
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Green

customer_reviews.title: It IS waterproof!
customer_reviews.text: Great lightweight and YES, WATERPROOF! Sound quality is preventing me from giving it 5 stars, but this has been splashed and dropped into the pool and still works. (It does float, too!)
customer_reviews.author: E.R.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, albeit with one minor design flaw
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. It gets very loud, and it sounds very clear. Definitely the best bluetooth speaker for its price. There is one design flaw, however. It cannot be used with solely the audio cable. It turns off when it doesn't pair to a device. This might be a programming flaw. To get around this, I pair it with my phone anyway, and I can still plug in my laptop. I know that the purpose is to use bluetooth, but I just wish they designed it to work without pairing as well. I am still satisfied. I would buy it again if it breaks down. Totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: mario torres

customer_reviews.title: Great product for low price
customer_reviews.text: Awesome for by the pool! Small, but gives off great sound. We enjoy how we can slip our phone into the waterproof bag that came with it & connect Bluetooth & pick music while floating around - very convenient. Water proof for sure. Great price for a product like this.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Shields

customer_reviews.title: Good speaker for the price
customer_reviews.text: Loud for a small speaker. Haven’t tested to see if it is waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Mark H.

customer_reviews.title: I like it allot
customer_reviews.text: It's a great little music box. It plays the sound great.
customer_reviews.author: S. Nagel

customer_reviews.title: Good for 1 time use - must not be fully waterproof
customer_reviews.text: This speaker worked well for the one time we used it on a beach on the lake. It was exposed to water on a raft, but the product is described as waterproof - so we assumed we could use it as such. After using it the one time, it no longer charges and is completely dead. Would not recommend purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne M. Devlin

customer_reviews.title: Not very loud
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised, although it was difficult to get it set up originally, as there are so few buttons on it, and it took a little while. Also, the volume isn't near as loud as I was hoping.
customer_reviews.author: artwolf

customer_reviews.title: while in the shower its fine. I wanted this item for summer swimming and ...
customer_reviews.text: while in the shower its fine. I wanted this item for summer swimming and the moment it floats on either side the music stops....
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: sturdy but the battery does not last as long as ...
customer_reviews.text: sturdy but the battery does not last as long as stated. pretty good though as the previous speakers I'd broken dropping so Id by this again
customer_reviews.author: L. Rickard

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 9 months, very few uses
customer_reviews.text: Bought to use when in the hot tub...used maybe only a dozen times and no longer works. Has actually been broken for 2 months before writing this review...so disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: NGsmom

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: More than I could've ever expected I'm totally amazed at how long the battery life is I work 12hr days and it lasts the entire day and I'm a heavy equipment operator therefore it's very noisy sound is very clear very durable as well I've dropped it tons of times I could go on and on one word AMAZING!!
customer_reviews.author: Mario Rolland

customer_reviews.title: Very nice speakers that is portable and sounds good.
customer_reviews.text: This portable speakers are pretty darn good. Good sound and easy to pair with your phone/device. Was surprise on how small this speaker was and very portable. I use it all the time when I am outside and it lasts a long time on a single charge. Very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Gokou

customer_reviews.title: Great water resistant speaker
customer_reviews.text: I've had this speaker for about 1 year. I use it at the lake often. Great sound quality for a little speaker. Water resistance really works!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Best speaker for the money
customer_reviews.text: I have had the opportunity to test many different Bluetooth speakers and I can honestly say, for the price, nothing out there can touch this speaker. Where the JTD lacks in bass(nothing in this size or price range will have it anyways) it excels in literally every other field. I have had it over a year now and use it almost daily. Phenomenal product with a great price. If you want better sound, you'll pay more. Best speaker for the money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked fine, sounded fine for my needs but not shock ...
customer_reviews.text: Update: They replaced my speaker and this one works much better so far. They were quick to respond to my concerns so I'm happy with their costumer service. Worked fine, sounded fine for my needs but not shock resistant. Mine fell from the height of my waist and the back screen broke off. Didn't even have it one month when this happened.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn M

customer_reviews.title: You won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Great sound. I use it outside by the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Momma Pat

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: As a gift to my son-in-law he seems to be really impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Jay E. Christensen

customer_reviews.title: Great music Box !
customer_reviews.text: For a smaller item this thing is very loud, great quality built... You won't be dissatisfied when you purchase the item . my dog loves sleeping next to it when Pandora plays !
customer_reviews.author: Lena L

customer_reviews.title: These bad boys pack a punch
customer_reviews.text: These bad boys pack a punch. They get much louder than I would have expected. I use mine on a daily basis. Hold a charge well and has pretty good sound. I even bought a second one for a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: It stopped working after 1 use!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product as a gift and my friend used it one time then it stopped working completely!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice over all
customer_reviews.text: If you don't have fingernails it's hard to remove the protective cover
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works Great!! The BEST YOU CAN GET FOR THE MONEY, A REALLY DEAL!!!
customer_reviews.author: Travis Hudson

customer_reviews.title: good little speaker
customer_reviews.text: Battery lasts way longer than advertised. Good sound quality for such a small speaker. Perfect for my boat.
customer_reviews.author: Poto

customer_reviews.title: Small but mighty
customer_reviews.text: Great product, great sound for the size. Always take it kayaking
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Renberg

customer_reviews.title: Got it to listen to music while riding atv and it works great.
customer_reviews.text: Small, loud and rugged. Got it to listen to music while riding atv and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie B

customer_reviews.title: Good speaker
customer_reviews.text: It’s nice but doesn’t have a great amount of range for blutooth connection.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Marshall

customer_reviews.title: sounds great, quality... Not so much
customer_reviews.text: Back of speaker just fell off completely It will no longer communicate with my phone, and therefore it can't be used...
customer_reviews.author: ZacharyGrizzard

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this little box great loud sound and just the right size and lightweight my granddaughter can carry it around in the pool
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Speakers!
customer_reviews.text: works great, sounds great! What can I say, It's Great!
customer_reviews.author: Motorman1057

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than I thought
customer_reviews.text: I still haven't gotten it wet, but it works perfect for out by the pool. knowing that it could withstand some water is a huge plus. Sounds great!
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up, sounds great. I am very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Suggs

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used this yet but is the perfect size to take on the boat when I go out.
customer_reviews.author: Randy DeWeese

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not "splash proof"
customer_reviews.text: EDIT: The company reached out to me with a new device. I received it last week and it has worked great since next to the pool and shower. Great customer service. Bought this wireless bluetooth "splash proof" speaker for my boyfriend for christmas. This speaker worked great UNTIL it was next to water... First nice day of the summer to swim and let me tell you, it was not splash proof. One kid jumped too close to it and all of a sudden it stopped working. I reassured my boyfriend it was splash proof and it just needed to be charged. After being charged over night it stopped working completely. Not happy at all....
customer_reviews.author: Bailey

customer_reviews.title: They love them. The speakers arrived a few days after ...
customer_reviews.text: These shower speakers (I bought two) were for my two adult sons. They love them. The speakers arrived a few days after ordering. This is how we want ALL online transactions to be.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Wissman

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great, but the issues....
customer_reviews.text: The sound is great. However, I'm not sure if it's not charging completely or what but it craps out after 20 mins or so. Plugged in it still turns off periodically. the BT syncs right away. The phono plugs work great with anything else that may not have BT. I just wish it would stay on for the 8-10 hours it said. UPDATE: My review posted and I was contacted by J-Tech via email. They guarantee their product for 1 year, so they're replacing it for no cost. Will update again with new information....they get an extra star for their diligence.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Bogart

customer_reviews.title: Good speaker for 3-4 hours
customer_reviews.text: Sounds loud and clear. But won't hold a for more than 3-4 hours of continuous playing
customer_reviews.author: R. Baires

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It says the battery will last 10 hours playing ie used it 4 hours straight and it died
customer_reviews.author: jacob j.

customer_reviews.title: great little speaker
customer_reviews.text: does what it said it would do and has great sound, happy with this purchase and the product is solid
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Sides

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great you can't beat the price I highly recommend this speaker
customer_reviews.author: Leo M.

customer_reviews.title: I just love it! Doesn't take up a lot of room ...
customer_reviews.text: I just love it! Doesn't take up a lot of room and has a great sound! I would order it again!
customer_reviews.author: Jo Ann Klonowski

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend to a friend
customer_reviews.text: It was well worth the purchase, I would recommend to a friend. Thx for your concern.
customer_reviews.author: william gallishaw

customer_reviews.title: Keep the original packaging!
customer_reviews.text: Update: The company worked with me to find an acceptable resolution. We love this speaker! The speaker worked only one time. Now it will not turn on. There is no light to indicate it is charging. This is the ONLY bad review I have ever left in all my years as an Amazon.com customer. I am waiting to see if I can get a replacement without the original packaging (I never expected to have any problems).
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: I loved it. But
customer_reviews.text: While it was working, I loved it. But, it is DEFINITELY NOT waterproof as it says. I took it on my paddleboard and it dipped into the water. It does float like stated but after awhile it quit working. I purchased two and would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Great sound but a bit difficult to know how to operate
customer_reviews.text: I cannot get this speaker to work with an AUX cable inserted, so it only works with a bluetooth connection. It is difficult to know if it is on or not, but the sound quality is very good, and the casing is durable
customer_reviews.author: Cornelius

customer_reviews.title: Wet tunes
customer_reviews.text: Great little speaker blue tooth works easy goodvsoubd and water resistant
customer_reviews.author: Fire Breather

customer_reviews.title: Execellent product
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic little speaker, for a fantastic price! I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jose P Gomez

customer_reviews.title: No power, doesn't work, waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe these are all 5 star reviews. Most of them seem to be from people who got this for free. Mine sounded ok, for the first 1 minute I had it on. I haven't been able to get any sort of response from it since. I've tried 4 different micro USB chargers with no success. It can't seem to retain any power. Awesome. Also, the instruction manual is very unprofessional, with rather poor grammar. This will be on a truck back to Amazon by the beginning of next week.
customer_reviews.author: DJess

product_meta.title: JTD Waterproof Floating Speaker, Armor Portable Bluetooth Speaker (Blue) 5W Strong Drive/Passive Radiator for Rich Immersive Sound, Waterproof Shockproof and Dustproof Outdoor with Power Supply
product_meta.description:
Specification:
Bluetooth 4.0
Playback time: 8-10 hours
Charging time: 2-3 hours
Battery: 3.7V/500 MAH
Connection range: up to 32 feet
Frequency Response: 2.4GHz-2.48 KHz

1. Great for Outdoors and Shower
The silicone cases and interface design ensure Shockproof, Dustproof Waterproof, level up to IPX6, can be used under harsh environment (such as, outdoor and shower)

2. Enjoy Crystal Clear Sound
Clear sound, deep bass and excellent performance as standard. It is not just an adorable ordinary speaker, it uses Bluetooth 4.0 technology to get rid of the shackles of the line has become a unique ornaments, but play the ultra-high quality music when you place it anywhere.

3. Free Your Hands
No matter enjoy bathroom or outdoors time, the double built-in MIC and hands-free function can let you enjoy wonderful music without the hassle of long cable and set free your hand from answering a call

4. Impressive & Friendly Design
As a Bluetooth Speaker that wirelessly connect mobile phone, computer equipment, it is designed more user-friendly and smart, make you enjoy music easily and more comfortable. LONG LIFE BATTERY & POWERFUL - Installed rechargeable lithium-ion battery delivers up to 10 hours of playing time on a single charge. Charges fully in just 2-3 hours / Rechargeable via USB cable (included). 

5. For Every Place, For Every Devices.
-You can use this item at home, office, car, outdoors etc.
-It supports any Bluetooth-enabled devices such as iPhone, iPad, Samsung Galaxy/Note/tablet, HTC and so on), PDA, tablet PC, iPad, Mac Air, MP3 players, PCs, laptops, etc.

What is included:
JTD Mini Speaker Blue x 1
USB charge cable x 1
3.5mm audio cable x 1
User Manual x 1
feature_bullets: ✔ AMAZINGLY CRISP CRISTAL CLEAR SOUND - Amazing clarity, deep bass and super rich sound. With the hottest sound optimizer technology on planet Earth, you will get lost in the music with the wildest sound quality imaginable. Experience your music while in the shower like never before!

✔ FAST & SUPER EASY CONNECTION - It supports any Bluetooth-enabled devices such as iPhone, iPad, Samsung Galaxy/Note/tablet, HTC and so on), PDA, tablet PC, iPad, Mac Air, MP3 players, PCs, laptops, etc.
✔ GREAT FOR OUTDOOR AND SHOWER - The silicone cases and interface design ensure Shockproof, Dustproof Waterproof, level up to IPX6

✔ LONG LIFE BATTERY & POWERFUL - Installed rechargeable lithium-ion battery delivers up to 10 hours of playing time on a single charge. Charges fully in just 2-3 hours / Rechargeable via USB cable (included).

✔ INCREDIBLY SLEEK DESIGN & ULTRA-PORTABLE - No matter enjoy bathroom or outdoors time, the double built-in MIC and hands-free function can let you enjoy wonderful music without the hassle of long cable and set free your hand from answering a call
